name: TheAtlantic
text: The "bronies," adult fans of the children's TV show "My Little Pony," have tacitly allowed white supremacists into their ranks for years. But following Black Lives Matter protests, they're finally waking up, @kait_tiffany reports: https://t.co/AzZyV5iFrv

name: TheAtlantic
text: The coronavirus outbreak has emboldened defenders of the nation-state, in Europe and beyond, @RachelDonadio writes: https://t.co/4VEYdCzS7U

name: TheAtlantic
text: How @mkonnikova trained to become a poker champion in just one year: https://t.co/EnKx7CPDZZ

name: TheAtlantic
text: Domestic abuse victims are worried that virtual visitations could give their abusers an intimate glimpse of their homes and even allow them to identify their locations, @AdminKlein writes: https://t.co/XJmetatMkl

name: TheAtlantic
text: Many people may want to shield their kids from the news right now, but research shows that children do better when their parents are honest about tragedy, @katejulian writes: https://t.co/Fq6jACjMTX
